org.apache.fop.fo

Class FOTreeBuilderContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fop.fo.FOTreeBuilderContext

  • public class FOTreeBuilderContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Context class providing information needed while building the FO tree.
